sentence.Network_en: I love the way a good flirtation can enliven the most mundane situation.
sentence.Network_cn: 恰到好处的打情骂俏能够使最平淡无奇的时刻变得生动有趣起来，我很喜欢这种感觉。

sentence.Network_en: In the secondary market, this quantity can enliven, has temporarily.
sentence.Network_cn: 二级市场上, 该股量能活跃, 暂持有.

sentence.Network_en: The Mansfield theatricals would enliven the whole neighbourhood exceedingly.
sentence.Network_cn: 曼斯菲尔德的业余演戏要把这整个地区大大轰动一番了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 个人简历英文翻译词汇大全_百度文库 ... enlarge 扩大 enliven 搞活 enrich 使丰富.
松松：3天背完GRE难词 ... lassitude n. 疲乏 20。 enliven vt. 使生气的, 使活泼, 使生动 21。 abruptly adv. 突然地, 唐突地 22。.
E开头的英语单词 ... 3.enhance：v. 增加，提高 5.enliven：v. 使活泼，使有生气 6.enmity：n. 仇恨，敌意.
英语四六级写作常用高分词组|英语四级写作 ... 使害怕 intimidate;frighten 带来生气 enliven 对手 rival.

list.abs: Stimulating interest begins with enlivening class atmosphere ;, 从活跃课堂气氛 , 激发学生兴趣;
In a room enlivened a colony intelligence , visitors are at a disadvantage ., 在群体智力活跃的屋子里 , 客人的地位是不利的.
知识点疑惑描述: 英文“ 搞活经济 ”怎么说? 知识点相关讲解  motivate the economy  —— bration007  enliven economy搞活经济  —— bibi57  invigorate the.
fire is the life force and animator which enlivens the dream .火元素是生命力和赋予生气者，它赋予了梦想生命。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (in the sense 'restore to life, give life to'; formerly also as inliven): from 16th-cent. enlive, inlive (in the same sense), from en-, in- (as an intensifier) + life

entry.tran: 使有趣;使生动；使更有活力
entry.def: To enliven events, situations, or people means to make them more lively or cheerful.

example.ex: I love the way a good flirtation can enliven the most mundane situation...
example.tran: 恰到好处的打情骂俏能够使最平淡无奇的时刻变得生动有趣起来，我很喜欢这种感觉。

example.ex: Even the most boring meeting was enlivened by Dan's presence.
example.tran: 即使是最无聊的会议，只要丹一出现，也会变得有趣起来。

sentences.sentence: "let's liven up this room a bit"

auth_sentence.content: It helps to enliven a dull afternoon of cricket.
auth_sentence.res_content: It helps to enliven a dull afternoon of cricket.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It helps to enliven a dull afternoon of cricket.

auth_sentence.content: Ripples of drama fleetingly enliven Xalayith and Powers' vocal interplay, she the forceful yin to his drowsy yang.

auth_sentence.content: Special mention should go to percussionists Robertino Silva and Ramiro Musotto, who enliven several tracks with samba rhythms.

Sentence.sentence: Naomi Pugh at Freed-Hardeman University speculated that professors would have to work harder to enliven their classes.
have to work harder to enliven their classes

means.word_mean: 使(某人或某物)更活跃或更愉快

sentences.en: The otherwise dreary book is enlivened by some very amusing illustrations.
sentences.cn: 这本枯燥乏味的书幸亏加了一些精彩的插图才变得生动有趣。
